The **Electric Mage** is a [role](/wiki/Role "Role") specific to *[SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM")*. They are a spellcaster class, and can be [clockwork automata](/wiki/Clockwork_automaton_\(starting_race\) "Clockwork automaton (starting race)"), [doppelgänger](/wiki/Doppelganger_\(starting_race\) "Doppelganger (starting race)"), [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)"), [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)"), [gnomes](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)"), [human](/wiki/Human_\(starting_race\) "Human (starting race)"), [illithid](/wiki/Illithid_\(starting_race\) "Illithid (starting race)"), [incantifiers](/wiki/Incantifier "Incantifier") or [nymphs](/wiki/Nymph_\(starting_race\) "Nymph (starting race)") of any alignment.

An Electric Mage starts the game with equipment and abilities related to lightning magic, including [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance"). Their starting pet is a [shock hound pup](/wiki/Shock_hound_pup "Shock hound pup").

The [Electric Mage quest](/wiki/Electric_Mage_quest "Electric Mage quest") sees you fighting the ghost of [Elvis Presley](/index.php?title=Elvis_Presley\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Elvis Presley (page does not exist)") for the [Thunder Whistle](/index.php?title=Thunder_Whistle\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Thunder Whistle (page does not exist)").

## Starting Equipment

- a [blessed](/wiki/Blessed "Blessed") +1 [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")
- an [uncursed](/wiki/Uncursed "Uncursed") +0 [studded leather armor](/wiki/Studded_leather_armor "Studded leather armor")
- 2 uncursed [food rations](/wiki/Food_ration "Food ration")
- a random scroll
- a random potion
- a random ring
- a [wand of lightning](/wiki/Wand_of_lightning "Wand of lightning")
- spellbooks of [shocking sphere](/index.php?title=Spellbook_of_shocking_sphere\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Spellbook of shocking sphere (page does not exist)"), [lightning](/wiki/Spellbook_of_lightning "Spellbook of lightning") and either [light](/wiki/Spellbook_of_light "Spellbook of light") or [slow monster](/wiki/Spellbook_of_slow_monster "Spellbook of slow monster")

## Techniques

Electric mages gain [techniques](/wiki/Technique "Technique") at these [experience levels](/wiki/Experience_level "Experience level"):

- XL 1 : [reinforce memory](/wiki/Reinforce_memory "Reinforce memory")
- XL 3 : [power surge](/wiki/Power_surge "Power surge")
- XL 5 : [draw energy](/wiki/Draw_energy "Draw energy")
- XL 7 : [sigil of control](/wiki/Sigil_of_control "Sigil of control")
- XL 10 : [sigil of tempest](/wiki/Sigil_of_tempest "Sigil of tempest")
- XL 20 : [sigil of discharge](/wiki/Sigil_of_discharge "Sigil of discharge")

## Intrinsics

- XL 1: [Shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance")
- XL 7: Polymorph into baby [blue dragon](/wiki/Blue_dragon "Blue dragon") form
- XL 14: Polymorph into adult [blue dragon](/wiki/Blue_dragon "Blue dragon") form

To use your polymorph ability, you must use the extended command #youpoly.

* Neutral: Magnet

## Electric Mage rank titles

The [status line](/wiki/Status_line "Status line") shows you to be one of the following ranks when you reach the specified experience level:

- XL 1-2: Charger
- XL 3-5: Bolter
- XL 6-9: Buzzer
- XL 10-13: Hummer
- XL 14-17: Energic
- XL 18-21: Arclite
- XL 22-25: Volt Technician
- XL 26-29: Thundermage
- XL 30: Shock-Master

## Strategy

The Electric Mage is a battlemage similar to the flame/ice mage, with the main difference being that they specialize in lightning magic. Their starting pet is also shock resistant, making it much safer to use lightning spells/wands. Upon leveling up enough, the shock hound pup will grow into an adult [shock hound](/wiki/Shock_hound "Shock hound") which is very strong and capable of taking down lots of enemies.

The Electric Mage is a role specific to SlashTHEM. They are a spellcaster class, and can be clockwork automata, doppelgänger, drow, elves, gnomes, human, illithid, incantifiers or nymphs of any alignment.

An Electric Mage starts the game with equipment and abilities related to lightning magic, including shock resistance. Their starting pet is a shock hound pup.

The Electric Mage quest sees you fighting the ghost of Elvis Presley for the Thunder Whistle.

Elvis Presley (No tile)
Attacks Weapon 2d6 physical, Weapon 2d8 shock, Claw 2d6 steal Amulet
Elvis Presley (No tile)
Attacks

Weapon 2d6 physical, Weapon 2d8 shock, Claw 2d6 steal Amulet

Base level 15

Speed 12
Base AC -5
Base MR 50
Alignment -30 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable no
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances cold, disintegration, sleep, poison, stoning
Resistances conveyed None

Elvis Presley:

  • can fly.
  • can phase through walls.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • does not have a solid form.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is undead.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • wants your quest artifact.
  • waits for you to come.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.

The Electric Mage quest mainly spawns shoggoths and other blobs, and the player may suffer from acid damage quite often. Their quest nemesis, the ghost of Elvis Presley, isn't too hard to take out.

Origin

The Electric Mage is a lightning-based pendant to SLASH'EM's Flame Mage and Ice Mage.
